title: 3: Red, White & Royal Blue
itunes:title: Red, White & Royal Blue
description: This month's Readhead Book Of The Month is Red, White & Royal Blue by Casey McQuiston. In this episode Jackie, Margo, Dana and Becky break down all of their thoughts on the novel and share their favorite (and least favorite) elements and characters from the book. They're asking each other insightful document based questions, and responding to some of your questions as well. We hope you enjoy this episode and join us next month when the book is Dana's choice. Dana has chosen Nothing To See Here by Kevin Wilson as her book of the month. Follow @thereadheads on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thereadheads/ Join our Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/thereadheads/ Submit a question or comment to us at thereadheadsbookclub@gmail.com The overall Readheads Rating for Red, White & Royal Blue is 3.125 stars.
